General.Name: Naphtha
General.Description: Naphtha Israel Petroleum Corp. Ltd. engages in the exploration, production, and sale of oil and gas in Israel and the United States. The company is also involved in the rental of real estate properties, operation of hotels, and provision of management services in Israel, Germany, Hungary, and the Czech Republic. In addition, it provides operator services of oil and gas assets and ancillary services for oil and gas drilling. The company serves electricity producers, industrial customers, private electricity producers, and natural gas marketing companies. The company was incorporated in 1956 and is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.

3.Name: Mr. Ron  Maor
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Isramco Oil & Gas Ltd
